pullRequest.title: BAEL-4163 - Counting matches for a regex

commit.message: BAEL-4163 - Counting matches for a regex

nodes.bodyText: Do we need the compiler plugin at all? Isn't it Java 8 by default anyway?
This doesn't have to be in a @Before - it can be in the initializer list of the class, and probably should be.
let's move the .count() to the previous line to make it easier to understand it even when commented

commit.message: BAEL-4163 : Adding more test to assure quality of the examples

nodes.bodyText: Please put a line in line // uncomment to try with Java 9 on all these commented out tests

commit.message: BAEL-4163 : Minor adjustements to give more context about the commented out tests
